title: Mount Batur Sunrise Trek (Half-day)
overview: An early morning adventure to hike Mount Batur and witness a breathtaking sunrise over Bali.

stops.description: Arrive at the base and meet your trekking guide.
Begin the trek to the summit.
Reach the summit in time for sunrise and breakfast.
Relax in natural hot springs nearby (optional).
